title: The Melodic Adventures of Kevin Wood: A Superheroic Symphony
summary: Over one week, 61-year-old Kevin Wood discovers his superpowers through his love for music and advising, saving his neighborhood and learning about his new abilities.
summaryGerman: Über eine Woche hinweg entdeckt der 61-jährige Kevin Wood seine Superkräfte durch seine Liebe zur Musik und zum Beraten, rettet seine Nachbarschaft und lernt seine neuen Fähigkeiten kennen.
summaryDutch: Gedurende een week ontdekt de 61-jarige Kevin Wood zijn superkrachten door zijn liefde voor muziek en adviseren, redt hij zijn buurt en leert hij over zijn nieuwe vaardigheden.
summaryFrench: Pendant une semaine, Kevin Wood, 61 ans, découvre ses superpouvoirs grâce à son amour pour la musique et le conseil, sauve son quartier et apprend ses nouvelles capacités.

story.text: Kevin Wood, age 61, was advising a young group of musicians when he first noticed his ability to harmonize objects around him, syncing them to the melody he played on his violin.
Excited by his discovery, Kevin experimented with different tunes, finding he could manipulate objects' movements, drawing them closer or pushing them away based on the intensity of his music.
While advising at the local youth center, Kevin used his new powers to avert a potential accident, creating a barrier of air by playing a powerful chord.
Feeling confident, Kevin staged an impromptu concert in the park, subtly using his powers to enhance the performance, mesmerizing his audience with floating lights that danced to the rhythm.
Disaster struck when a sudden storm threatened the town. Kevin played a commanding orchestral piece that manipulated the wind, redirecting the storm away from his neighborhood.
After yesterday's fatigue, Kevin spent a quiet day at home, reflecting on how to use his powers for good, reinforcing harmony not just in music but within his community.
News of his heroic actions spread, and Kevin was approached by more communities seeking his guidance and protection. He realized his life had changed forever, embracing his role as a protector.

ending: And so, Kevin Wood lived his days not just as a mentor, but as a guardian of harmony.
moral: Embrace your unique talents; they may lead you to your true purpose.
